00026 #include "ofx_request_accountinfo.hh"

00028 using namespace std;
00029 
00030 char* libofx_request_accountinfo( const OfxFiLogin* login )
00031 {
00032   OfxAccountInfoRequest strq( *login );
00033   string request = OfxHeader(login->header_version) + strq.Output();
00034 
00035   unsigned size = request.size();
00036   char* result = (char*)malloc(size + 1);
00037   request.copy(result,size);
00038   result[size] = 0;
00039   
00040   return result;
00041 }

00074 OfxAccountInfoRequest::OfxAccountInfoRequest( const OfxFiLogin& fi ):
00075   OfxRequest(fi)
00076 {
00077   Add( SignOnRequest() );
00078 
00079   OfxAggregate acctinforqTag("ACCTINFORQ");
00080   acctinforqTag.Add( "DTACCTUP", time_t_to_ofxdate( 0 ) );
00081   Add ( RequestMessage("SIGNUP","ACCTINFO", acctinforqTag) );
00082 }
